Its a comic from the late 90s, early 2000s that dealt with well, Satan, after he left hell to two other angels due to events in the comic The Sandman. Apparently its really good.

It wasn't a police procedural, which is why I feel its strange choice. Ah dunno. Maybe its cause police stuff sells.
